name: Word Cake - Fun Word Game
description:
Word Cake is a fun and challenging word game that will have you playing for hours!

The goal of the game is to unscramble the 5 letter cake words to form real words. You need to be quick as you only have a certain amount of time to figure out the puzzle. This game will test your concentration and spelling skills, and also help improve them.

GAME MODES:
Endless - Complete each word in less then 20 seconds.
Timed - Complete as many words as you can in 3 minutes!

FEATURES:
- Unscramble the cake letters to make real words.
- Fun and challenging word game.
- Test your spelling and concentration skills.

How many words can you make from the delicious cake?
